@rachelthaingray @SueJohnGWL @SubcityRadio @gwlkettle You were brilliant Rachel! Loved the chemistry between you & @ea_obrien #naturals
@ea_obrien @SueJohnGWL @rachelthaingray Oh and I loved your toons x
@ea_obrien @SueJohnGWL @rachelthaingray You have the perfect radio voice!
@nmaksymuik @ea_obrien @rachelthaingray @SubcityRadio @gwlkettle They were SO good!
@rachelthaingray @ea_obrien You were both absolutely amazing on your @SubcityRadio Sunday Brunch debut! Best radio listen I've had in ages.
@nmaksymuik checked out archive buddy @ea_obrien broadcasting now with @rachelthaingray on @SubcityRadio? She's smashing it! @gwlkettle
@Mcluskers you are broadcasting live now on @SubcityRadio ! talking @janicemparker on the @gwlkettle Sunday Brunch show...
@kaitewelsh @CreativeScots @gwlkettle @SubcityRadio Live now or download at your leisure...@rachelthaingray & @ea_obrien are smashing it.
I'll be talking @janicemparker 1973 on @SubcityRadio in 5 mins...@lukepellmakes @gwlkettle Sunday Brunch show @rachelthaingray @ea_obrien
@CreativeScots @kaitewelsh You might be interested to hear a new @gwlkettle Sunday Brunch radio show on @SubcityRadio
@StandardIssueUK I think you wonderful women might like to know that @gwlkettle now has a radio sunday brunch prog on @SubcityRadio
@srslypod Really think you 2 wonderful women would like the @gwlkettle & our box fresh new prog on @SubcityRadio (gwlkettle sunday brunch)
@CPatrickPlay have you heard @rachelthaingray & @ea_obrien DJing on @SubcityRadio? Check out the @gwlkettle Sunday Brunch show. #divine
That's @rachelthaingray & @ea_obrien playing The Au Pairs on @SubcityRadio ! Sunday brunch time bliss! @tyciblog
Anyone who wanted to hear the cool team @gwlkettle should tune into @SubcityRadio now because @rachelthaingray & @ea_obrien are smashing it.
@SubcityRadio Ok so this is bad. I need to run but can't leave the house because you are too good! @rachelthaingray & @ea_obrien
@SubcityRadio Oh my - @rachelthaingray & @ea_obrien you were born to DJ - is their nothing you gals can't do? @gwlkettle on the airwaves!
That's @EmmaRitch on @BBCRadioScot in 10 & @gwlkettle on @SubcityRadio for new brunch prog @ 11 https://t.co/5go2LnNbRg #sisters on the mic.
@EngenderScot @EmmaRitch @BBCRadioScot An important voice in Scotland speaking at a critical time.

@Karenmca @herArchivist How beautiful.

@eppsphilomena @gwlkettle @hatefuldaughter No film of this gig but we're discussing upcoming readings & will see what we can share.
@eppsphilomena Last night @gwlkettle The phenomenal @hatefuldaughter delivered a scorching reading of her work inspired by Woolf's #Orlando
